Introduction¶

nfselib helps to process XML instance documents that obey the nfse XML schema.

With nfselib (nfselib.py) you can write Python code to:

  • Parse an XML document that obeys the nfse XML schema, creating instances of the Python classes that represent the types defined in the nfse schema. These Python classes are defined in nfselib.py.
  • Create instances of classes that represent the types described in the nfse XML schema.
  • Write Python application code that uses the classes that represent nfse types.
  • Export the objects to an XML document.

Schemas¶

The nfselib.py module in this package was generated from the XML schemas in ./schemas.

generateDS.py¶

The nfselib.py module in this package was generated by generateDS.py. You can learn about generateDS.py here: http://www.rexx.com/~dkuhlman/generateDS.html
